character.title: Movement 8
character.description: This can be played to move you 8 spaces OR used as a dodge card (Removes debris and ram)

character.title: Debris
character.description: The five racers at the front cannot play move cards

character.title: Ram
character.description: Move forward 3, the racer in front of you after the move cannot play move cards

character.title: Mech Failure
character.description: Target another user, target is prevented from playing move cards

character.title: Sabotage
character.description: Target another user, Target is killed if they end a turn with it and another hazard applied

character.title: Heart Attack
character.description: Target another user, kills them in three turns if not removed

character.title: High G
character.description: Target another user, You can't play a move card higher than move 2.

character.title: Crash
character.description: Played on self, move 1. Anyone in your space at the start of your next turn dies.

character.title: Cyber Healthcare
character.description: Removes heart attack and High G forces
